${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you change the constructor of your card to use super(cardInfo, true); this will be the card's description when it is upgraded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:OakenShield.NAME: Oaken Shield
${modID}:OakenShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:OpportunityStrike.NAME: Opportunity Strike
${modID}:OpportunityStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Ethereal.

${modID}:KnifeArtisan.NAME: Knife Artisan
${modID}:KnifeArtisan.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Add !M! Shivs to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WindUp.NAME: Wind Up
${modID}:WindUp.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Upgrade the next {!M!|>1=!M! |@=}card{!M!|>1=s|@=} you play this turn. NL Draw a card.

${modID}:BreakFingers.NAME: Break Fingers
${modID}:BreakFingers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has Weak, apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:Beatdown.NAME: Beatdown
${modID}:Beatdown.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage, then deal half that damage.{!Location!|0= NL (!HugYouColors:HalfDamage!)}

${modID}:Trek.NAME: Trek
${modID}:Trek.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Slimed to your hand. NL Gain !B! Block and draw a card.

${modID}:FingerPunch.NAME: Finger Punch
${modID}:FingerPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Damage dealt is increased by Dexterity.

${modID}:Gusto.NAME: Gusto
${modID}:Gusto.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Discard a card, then draw a random card of the same type.

${modID}:StayOnTarget.NAME: Stay on Target
${modID}:StayOnTarget.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard or Exhaust a card, gain !M! Strength until the end of your turn.

${modID}:VenomDirk.NAME: Venom Dirk
${modID}:VenomDirk.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply poison equal to unblocked damage.

${modID}:Toxicity.NAME: Toxicity
${modID}:Toxicity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal damage with an Attack, the target takes !M! damage for each of their debuffs.

${modID}:Raid.NAME: Raid
${modID}:Raid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the cost of this card by !M! this combat.

${modID}:Impede.NAME: Impede
${modID}:Impede.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the cost of this card by !M! this combat.

${modID}:Oppress.NAME: Oppress
${modID}:Oppress.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Build.NAME: Build
${modID}:Build.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Inventory.NAME: Inventory
${modID}:Inventory.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain X Orb slots. NL Next turn, draw X cards.{!Upgrades!|0= NL Exhaust.}

${modID}:Pinpoint.NAME: Pinpoint
${modID}:Pinpoint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus until the end of your turn.

${modID}:Converge.NAME: Converge
${modID}:Converge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:EnergySword.NAME: Energy Sword
${modID}:EnergySword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each Power you've played this combat.

${modID}:ColdSphere.NAME: Cold Sphere
${modID}:ColdSphere.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Lose !M! HP. NL Gain an Orb Slot. NL Channel !M! Frost. {!Upgrades!|0=NL Ethereal.}

${modID}:Bionic.NAME: Bionic
${modID}:Bionic.DESCRIPTION: Strength and Dexterity affect your Orbs. NL Focus affect cards damage and Block.

${modID}:CenterStrike.NAME: Center Strike
${modID}:CenterStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is affected by your Focus{!Upgrades!|1= twice}.

${modID}:Singularity.NAME: Singularity
${modID}:Singularity.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain [E] [E] {!Upgrades!|1=[E] }and draw !M! cards. NL Add a Void, Burn and Wound to your discard pile.

${modID}:Globality.NAME: Globality
${modID}:Globality.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Exhaust any number of cards in your hand. Draw that many cards and gain [E] equal to their cost.{!Upgrades!|0= NL Exhaust.}

${modID}:Productivity.NAME: Productivity
${modID}:Productivity.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|0=The first time|1=Whenever} you play a Power card{!Upgrades!|0= each turn}, Exhaust a{!Upgrades!|0= random} card and gain !M! Focus. NL Ethereal.

${modID}:FiredUp.NAME: Fired Up
${modID}:FiredUp.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.

${modID}:Denial.NAME: Denial
${modID}:Denial.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card.

${modID}:Spasm.NAME: Spasm
${modID}:Spasm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are in Calm, exit your Stance.

${modID}:Percussion.NAME: Percussion
${modID}:Percussion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:Soulforged.NAME: Soulforged
${modID}:Soulforged.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals twice as much damage for the rest of the combat. NL Ethereal.

${modID}:Counterbalance.NAME: Counterbalance
${modID}:Counterbalance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Retain your hand this turn.

${modID}:Plethora.NAME: Plethora
${modID}:Plethora.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Draw {!M!|1=a|>1=!M!} card{!M!|>1=s}. NL When Retained, increase draw by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Breach.NAME: Breach
${modID}:Breach.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Put {!Upgrades!|1=up to }{!M!|1=a|@=!M!} card{!M!|>1=s} from your draw pile to your discard pile. NL Draw a card.

${modID}:TargetedBlast.NAME: Targeted Blast
${modID}:TargetedBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the enemy with lowest health.

${modID}:Tower.NAME: Tower
${modID}:Tower.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your discard pile{!Upgrades!|1= +3}.{!Location!|0,1,2,3= NL (Deals !D! damage.)}

${modID}:LostBacteria.NAME: Lost Bacteria
${modID}:LostBacteria.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to all enemies. NL Channel a Frost.

${modID}:Steal.NAME: Steal
${modID}:Steal.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! cards. NL Increase this cards draw by 1 permanently. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Bounce.NAME: Bounce
${modID}:Bounce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] for each card you have discarded this turn.

${modID}:Leaves.NAME: Leaves
${modID}:Leaves.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice.

${modID}:Propel.NAME: Propel
${modID}:Propel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Shuffle an *Insight into your draw pile.

${modID}:Stockpile.NAME: Stockpile
${modID}:Stockpile.DESCRIPTION: Give a card in your hand Retain for the rest of combat.

${modID}:FlaringStrike.NAME: Flaring Strike
${modID}:FlaringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are in Wrath, exit your Stance. Otherwise, enter Wrath.

${modID}:Outplay.NAME: Outplay
${modID}:Outplay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! *Mark. NL Deals double damage to *Marked enemies.

${modID}:Bloodlust.NAME: Bloodlust
${modID}:Bloodlust.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter Wrath and gain !M! Strength. NL When Retained, increase cost by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Rustling.NAME: Rustling
${modID}:Rustling.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Whenever you change Stance, reduce cost by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Progression.NAME: Progression
${modID}:Progression.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Upgrade a random card in your hand.

${modID}:Accord.NAME: Accord
${modID}:Accord.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are in a Stance, hugyoucolors:Sync.

${modID}:Synchronization.NAME: Synchronization
${modID}:Synchronization.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the end of your turn,{!Upgrades!|0= if you have any empty Orb Slots,} hugyoucolors:Sync.

${modID}:Splash.NAME: Splash
${modID}:Splash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever an Orb is Evoked, return this from your discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:Stratagem.NAME: Stratagem
${modID}:Stratagem.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, choose a *Smite{!Upgrades!|0= or |1=, }*Safety{!Upgrades!|1= or *Insight} to add to your hand.

${modID}:Gambit.NAME: Gambit
${modID}:Gambit.DESCRIPTION: Put all cards in your draw pile with cost 0 in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage for each card drawn.

${modID}:Database.NAME: Database
${modID}:Database.DESCRIPTION: Gain Focus equal to the amount of cards in your hand until the end of your turn.

${modID}:Import.NAME: Import
${modID}:Import.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose 1 of 3 Powers of any color to add to your hand.{!Upgrades!|1= NL It costs 0 this turn.} NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TheSkyIsTheLimit.NAME: The Sky Is The Limit
${modID}:TheSkyIsTheLimit.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Your next Attack deals double damage.{!Upgrades!|0= NL Exhaust.|1=}

${modID}:Clever.NAME: Clever
${modID}:Clever.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL They cost 1 less this turn.

${modID}:Levitate.NAME: Levitate
${modID}:Levitate.DESCRIPTION: Discard any amount of cards at the start of your turn, and trigger your right-most Orbs passive for each discard.

${modID}:Negotiate.NAME: Negotiate
${modID}:Negotiate.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw {!M!|1=a|>1=!M!} card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Gain {!M!|1=an|>1=!M!} Orb slot{!M!|>1=s}. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain [E] [E] .

${modID}:Memorized.NAME: Memorized
${modID}:Memorized.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Costs 1 additional [E] for each time you lose HP this combat.

${modID}:Assassinate.NAME: Assassinate
${modID}:Assassinate.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Dark. NL Deal !D! damage for each Dark orb. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Slipping.NAME: Slipping
${modID}:Slipping.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, gain !M! Dexterity. NL This card starts in your discard pile.{!Upgrades!|0= NL Ethereal.}

${modID}:Archeology.NAME: Archeology
${modID}:Archeology.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play is free.

${modID}:Blight.NAME: Blight
${modID}:Blight.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Mark. NL ALL enemies gain Poison equal to their *Mark.

${modID}:DoNotWorry.NAME: Do Not Worry
${modID}:DoNotWorry.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Enter Calm. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:EmptyHand.NAME: Empty Hand
${modID}:EmptyHand.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard up to {!M!|1=one|>1=!M!} card{!M!|>1=s}. NL If you do, draw {!M!|1=a|>1=that many} card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exit your Stance.

${modID}:Perfect.NAME: Perfect
${modID}:Perfect.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter Divinity. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Torrent.NAME: Torrent
${modID}:Torrent.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, add a copy of this card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FashionBlade.NAME: Fashion Blade
${modID}:FashionBlade.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add X Shivs to your hand. NL Your Shivs deal {!M!|>1=!M!}X more damage.

${modID}:FinalStrike.NAME: Final Strike
${modID}:FinalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Mark. NL For each *Mark on the enemy, deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Torture.NAME: Torture
${modID}:Torture.DESCRIPTION: Enter Wrath. NL While in Wrath, you apply and suffer double debuffs.
